structure.unit: ARTICLE X. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT IN UNINCORPORATED AREAS

text.section:
Sec. 8A-231. Advertising space renters.
Every person renting for profit advertising space in or on any boat, car, bus, truck or other vehicle shall pay a local business tax as provided for in the schedule of taxes, for each such boat, car, bus, truck or other vehicle operated by him.
